code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import api from"../axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewBlog=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[item,setItem]=useState();useEffect(()=>{const formData={id};api.post(`/viewblog/${id}`,formData).then(response=>{setItem(response.data);}).catch(err=>console.error("Error fetching blog:",err));},[id]);if(!item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card shadow-lg p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.photo,className:"card-img-top rounded img-fluid",alt:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title text-center",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:item.content})]})]})});};export default ViewBlog;
